title: Dean and David
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Thai, Western, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A chain of restaurants originated in Germany. Has an emphasis on fresh and simple food. Offers cold-pressed juices, salads, soups, smoothies, sandwiches. Vegan choices include two soups, salads, sandwich and the Thai curry, in addition to plenty of juices. Casual atmosphere. Seating inside and out. Located at the back of the Ezdan Hotel.
streetAddress: Ezdan Hotel and Suites, West bay, Al Dafna
